languages.text: "Машиновидцы выдвинули гипотезу, что они погрузились в режим перезарядки. Когда будет накоплено достаточно энергии для новой трансляции, они вновь запустятся... По крайней мере, всем нам очень хочется в это верить".

"The Enginseers have proposed a hypothesis that it has entered some kind of recharge mode. After accumulating enough energy for a new translation, it will activate again... Or at least that's what all of us want to believe. Badly."
languages.original_text: "Машиновидцы выдвинули гипотезу, что они погрузились в режим перезарядки. Когда будет накоплено достаточно энергии для новой трансляции, они вновь запустятся... По крайней мере, всем нам очень хочется в это верить".

traits.locale_text: "Enginseers proposed a hypothesis that they entered the recharge mode. After accumulating enough energy for a new transmission they will launch again... At least we all want to believe in this."
"Enginseers proposed a hypothesis that they entered the recharge mode. After accumulating enough energy for a new transmission they will launch again... At least we all want to believe in this."
"The enginseers proposed a hypothesis that it entered a recharge mode. After accumulating enough energy for a new transmission, it will activate again... At least, we all want to believe in this."
"The enginseers proposed a hypothesis that it entered a recharge mode. After accumulating enough energy for a new transmission, it will activate again... At least, we all want to believe in this."

"The Enginseers have proposed a hypothesis that it has entered some kind of recharge mode. After accumulating enough energy for a new translation, it will activate again... Or at least that's what all of us want to believe. Badly."

languages.text: “技术人员进行了假设，认为次元门目前处于某种充能状态。当它积蓄了足够的能量，进行新的传输之后，应该就会再次激活……或者说，至少所有人都是这么期待的。”
languages.original_text: "The Enginseers have proposed a hypothesis that it has entered some kind of recharge mode. After accumulating enough energy for a new translation, it will activate again... Or at least that's what all of us want to believe. Badly."

traits.locale_text: “技术人员进行了假设，认为次元门目前处于某种充能状态。当它积蓄了足够的能量，进行新的传输之后，应该就会再次激活……或者说，至少所有人都是这么期待的。”

languages.text: « Les technaugures ont soumis l'hypothèse qu'il était entré en mode de recharge. Lorsqu'il aura accumulé suffisamment d'énergie pour effectuer une nouvelle transition, il s'activera à nouveau... Du moins, c'est ce que nous voulons tous croire. »
languages.original_text: "The Enginseers have proposed a hypothesis that it has entered some kind of recharge mode. After accumulating enough energy for a new translation, it will activate again... Or at least that's what all of us want to believe. Badly."

traits.locale_text: « Les technaugures ont soumis l'hypothèse qu'il était entré en mode de recharge. Lorsqu'il aura accumulé suffisamment d'énergie pour effectuer une nouvelle transition, il s'activera à nouveau... Du moins, c'est ce que nous voulons tous croire. »

languages.text: "Die Maschinenseher haben die Hypothese aufgestellt, dass es in eine Art Lademodus übergegangen ist. Hat es ausreichend Energie für eine neue Übersetzung gesammelt, wird es wieder aktiv ... Jedenfalls wollen wir das alle glauben. Unbedingt."
languages.original_text: "The Enginseers have proposed a hypothesis that it has entered some kind of recharge mode. After accumulating enough energy for a new translation, it will activate again... Or at least that's what all of us want to believe. Badly."

traits.locale_text: "Die Maschinenseher haben die Hypothese aufgestellt, dass es in eine Art Lademodus übergegangen ist. Hat es ausreichend Energie für eine neue Übersetzung gesammelt, wird es wieder aktiv ... Jedenfalls wollen wir das alle glauben. Unbedingt."

"Die Maschinenseher haben die Hypothese aufgestellt, dass es in einen Auflademodus übergegangen ist. Wenn es ausreichend Energie für eine neue Übertragung angesammelt hat, wird es wieder aktiv ... Zumindest wollen wir das alle glauben."

languages.text: «La hipótesis de los visioingenieros es que ha entrado en una especie de modo de recarga. Se volverá a activar una vez haya acumulado suficiente energía para realizar una nueva transmisión... Por lo menos, eso es lo que queremos creer. Con todo nuestro corazón».
languages.original_text: "The Enginseers have proposed a hypothesis that it has entered some kind of recharge mode. After accumulating enough energy for a new translation, it will activate again... Or at least that's what all of us want to believe. Badly."

traits.locale_text: «La hipótesis de los visioingenieros es que ha entrado en una especie de modo de recarga. Se volverá a activar una vez haya acumulado suficiente energía para realizar una nueva transmisión... Por lo menos, eso es lo que queremos creer. Con todo nuestro corazón».

languages.text: 「機関整備師たちは、あれが何らかの再充電モードに入ったのではないかという仮説を立てました。十分なエネルギーを蓄積すれば、再び転移を行うために起動するだろうと…少なくとも、私たちは皆、これを信じたいのです」
languages.original_text: "The Enginseers have proposed a hypothesis that it has entered some kind of recharge mode. After accumulating enough energy for a new translation, it will activate again... Or at least that's what all of us want to believe. Badly."

traits.locale_text: 「機関整備師たちは、あれが何らかの再充電モードに入ったのではないかという仮説を立てました。十分なエネルギーを蓄積すれば、再び転移を行うために起動するだろうと…少なくとも、私たちは皆、これを信じたいのです」

languages.text: "Mühedyumlar, bir çeşit dinlenme moduna girdiğini düşünüyor. Tekrar geçiş gerçekleştirebilecek kadar enerji topladığında yine faal olacaktır... En azından böyle olacağına inanmak istiyoruz. Hem de çok."
languages.original_text: "The Enginseers have proposed a hypothesis that it has entered some kind of recharge mode. After accumulating enough energy for a new translation, it will activate again... Or at least that's what all of us want to believe. Badly."
